紮.definition: (of troops) to be stationed (at); Taiwan pr. [zha2]

紮實.definition: variant of 扎實|扎实[zha1 shi5]

紮營.definition: to camp; to pitch camp; stationed; quartered; Taiwan pr. [zha2 ying2]

紮馬剌丁.definition: Jamal al-Din ibn Muhammad al-Najjari (13th century), famous Persian astronomer and scholar who served Khubilai Khan 忽必烈 from c. 1260

紮馬魯丁.definition: see 紮馬剌丁|扎马剌丁[Za1 ma3 la2 ding1]
